languages.text: {n}Побагровев, Торбальд глухо бурчит:{/n} "Я не желаю усобицы меж нами накануне битвы. Хорошо, Волки готовы воевать так, как пожелает железный жрец".
{n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."
languages.original_text: {n}Побагровев, Торбальд глухо бурчит:{/n} "Я не желаю усобицы меж нами накануне битвы. Хорошо, Волки готовы воевать так, как пожелает железный жрец".

traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德涨红了脸，以空洞的声音低吼起来。{/n}“战斗马上就要开始了，我可不想在这种时候结仇。很好，太空野狼愿意以齿轮神甫认为合适的方式作战。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德涨红了脸，以空洞的声音低吼起来。{/n}“战斗马上就要开始了，我可不想在这种时候结仇。很好，太空野狼愿意以齿轮祭司认为合适的方式作战。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald rougit et gronde d'une voix creuse :{/n} « Je ne tiens pas à ce que nous nous querellions à la veille de la bataille. Très bien, les Loups combattront conformément aux exigences du technoprêtre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald rougit et gronde d'une voix creuse :{/n} « Je ne tiens pas à ce que nous nous querellions à la veille de la bataille. Très bien, les Loups combattront conformément aux exigences du technoprêtre. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドの顔は真っ赤になり、虚ろな声で唸った。{/n}「俺は戦いの前夜に確執を持ちたくはない。いいだろう。狼たちは歯車の司祭が適切と考える方法で戦う」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドの顔は真っ赤になり、虚ろな声で唸った。{/n}「俺は戦いの前夜に確執を持ちたくはない。いいだろう。狼たちは歯車の司祭が適切と考える方法で戦う」
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald se sonroja y espeta con voz grave:{/n} «Mi intención no es que nos peleemos en vísperas de la batalla. De acuerdo. Los Lobos lucharemos como considere oportuno el engranasacerdote».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald se sonroja y espeta con voz grave:{/n} «Mi intención no es que nos peleemos en vísperas de la batalla. De acuerdo. Los Lobos lucharemos como considere oportuno el engranasacerdote».
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbalds Gesicht errötet, und er grollt mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Ich möchte nicht, dass wir am Vorabend der Schlacht miteinander streiten. Also schön. Die Wolves werden kämpfen, wie der Zahnradpriester es für richtig hält."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbalds Gesicht errötet, und er grollt mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Ich möchte nicht, dass wir am Vorabend der Schlacht miteinander streiten. Also schön. Die Wolves werden kämpfen, wie der Zahnradpriester es für richtig hält."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald'ın yüzü kızarıyor, sonrasında umursamaz bir sesle gürleyerek konuşuyor.{/n} "Savaş arifesinde aramızda anlaşmazlık çıkmasını istemiyorum. Öyle olsun. Kurtlar, dişli rahibin uygun gördüğü biçimde savaşacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face reddens, and he rumbles in a hollow voice,{/n} "I do not wish us to feud on the eve of battle. Very well. The Wolves will fight the way the cog-priest deems fit."
